value:
You know, comfortable clothing like
this suits me a whole lot better than
some heavy suit of armor.

My hometown, Derdriu, is often called
the Aquatic Capital. It's a great place
to spend a summer vacation.

The imperial princess and crown
prince are here too? Time to find out
which of us is the fastest swimmer!

You can't REALLY say you're living it
up on a tropical island unless you put
together a feast, right? Right.

I'm still not gonna put my faith in any
gods, but I guess I can be a little
grateful for the summer season.

I was sort of in the middle of my
vacation, so it'd be great if I could get
back to $Nf soon.

Looks like I've worked up quite the
sweat. Now it's time to get ready for
a feast!

You know, running around under the
sun isn't all that bad sometimes.

Starting to think I may have overdone
this whole vacation thing...

It's like you read my mind—this is just
what I need to beat the summer heat!

I'm Claude, of the Leicester Alliance.
You're planning a trip to the beach,
right? Perfect, count me in!

Phew! It's been ages since I was able
to kick back and unwind like this...
Beaches really are the best, huh?$k$pNow, on a completely unrelated note,
did you know that the bowstring
affects a bow's performance?$k$pI know, I know, it sounds obvious. But
hear me out, $Nu.$k$pIf you keep a bow strung for too long,
it'll eventually warp, and might even
become useless.$k$pIn other words, you need to give the
bowstring a break.$k$pIt's the same with people. If they stay
tense and guarded, they'll get worn
out, and end up falling apart.$k$pIf you want to take care of yourself,
sometimes the best thing to do is just
give yourself time to relax.$k$pSpeaking of which, I'm feeling nice
and refreshed now. Time to make
sure this trip is one to remember!
たあっ！
そぉれっ！
うっわ…
つめてっ！
Ride the wave!
Let's settle it with a swim!
You're sunk!
Ah, summer memories…
Ow! Cramp! Cramp!
Heh.
Nothing's better than a tropical island vacation.
Gah! Your hands are so cold! Were you holding a drink or something?
Heroes around here are getting a little rowdy. I'll let 'em know we're aiming for a more laid-back vibe.
*yawn* I'm gonna go find a nice, shady place to nap.
I'm planning a big party on the beach after the sun goes down. Invite any Heroes you know!
If the whole world were as peaceful as this island, well... It'd be nice, but...I think I'd want something more.
Wow, I can't even enjoy one day at the beach without you ordering me around... H-hey, come on, now! You know I'm kidding!
Bright idea!
That way, huh?
Dazzling.
